title: Relax with this Dunham Corner Rattan Set from Outdoor Living
content:
This beautiful rattan sofa set is a classic choice for outdoor living and will look the part in any contemporary or traditional garden. And with this exclusive deal, it can be yours for just £499, plus free delivery. You will be saving £96 – what’s more, this offer from Outdoor Living isn’t available anywhere else! Simply use the code at the WOW-DUNHAM-2021 checkout.

Save £96 now

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

Ready to purchase your set here for just £499, plus free delivery? Don’t forget to enter the code WOW-DUNHAM-2021 at checkout.

About the set: 

  • 4-Seater Corner Rattan Set
  • Neutral tone
  • Includes centrepiece coffee table, cushion pads and covers
  • Made from all-weather garden fabric to withstand the British weather!
  • Coffee table comes with a tempered glass tabletop which ensures durability and makes it easy to wipe clean
  • Weather and water-resistant cushions 

Save £96 now

Offer ends 16/09/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

Click on the image below for exclusive spring deals…

author: Steve Newell
